scripts.pub: npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.update-microservices: npm install @semiheimerco/common@latest && cd ../auth && npm install @semiheimerco/common@latest && cd ../tickets && npm install @semiheimerco/common@latest && cd ../payments && npm install @semiheimerco/common@latest && cd ../orders && npm install @semiheimerco/common@latest && cd ../expiration && npm install @semiheimerco/common@latest
